MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL65  postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Boston Street and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11PM due to a fault on the underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:02PM on 25th January 2021.
